item.title: Euler
item.description: Test of subtree index. The text isn’t being output, but otherwise it behaves as expected. Multiples of 3 and 5 (defun multiples-3|5 (n) (cl-flet ((pred (x) (or (= 0 (mod x 3)) (= 0 (mod x 5))))) (let ((sum 0) (i 0)) (while (< i n) (if (pred i) (cl-incf sum i)) (cl-incf i)) sum))) (multiples-3|5 1000) 233168

item.title: Multiples of 3 and 5
item.description: (defun multiples-3|5 (n) (cl-flet ((pred (x) (or (= 0 (mod x 3)) (= 0 (mod x 5))))) (let ((sum 0) (i 0)) (while (< i n) (if (pred i) (cl-incf sum i)) (cl-incf i)) sum))) (multiples-3|5 1000) 233168
